configureGame.title: Please enter the names of the players:
configureGame.wolkeInfo: This rule belongs to the anniversary edition and can only be used if the game set includes special cards such as Cloud, Juggler, Dragon, Fairy and Bomb. If a player receives the Cloud, their prediction will be adjusted by +1 or -1 at the end of the round; the calculation is done automatically. Important: When entering results you must indicate which player received the Cloud.
configureGame.notEqualInfo: The sum of all players' predictions must not equal the number of tricks available in that round. Example: In round 5 there are 5 tricks â€” the sum of all predictions must therefore not be 5. If the total would otherwise match the number of tricks, the last player to announce a prediction must adjust theirs so the overall sum differs.

errors.gapInNames: Player names must be entered consecutively from top to bottom.

confirmDialog.title: Do you really want to end the current game?
